LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_disableFurGraphic: Turns off the visual changes introduced by Mechaskin. A restart is required to apply the settings.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_disableMechanoidizationMecha: Disables opinion effects from mechanoidization. A restart is required to apply the settings.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_mecaXenotypeIsInheritable: Changes Meca xenotype allowing genes to be inherited. What makes this xenotype compatible with sangophages and other xenogeneic xenotypes.
